name: Blood Waves
description: Hardcore and bloody shooter where you will have to repel the attacks of the living dead using the destroying traps, defensive barricades and also weapon of close and long-range combat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or AMD FX-6350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 - 3770 or AMD FX-8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (3 GB VRAM) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
